codeSystems.title: Tipo de Documento do Indivíduo

codeSystems.title: Especialidade
codeSystems.description: Especialidade médica (Resolução CFM n. 2.330/2023)

codeSystems.name: EventSummaryType
codeSystems.title: EventSummaryType
codeSystems.description: Tipos de estruturas usadas para construir um registro eletrônico de saúde do tipo "sumário de evento ou contato assistencial"

codeSystems.name: NivelFederacao
codeSystems.title: Nível da Federacao
codeSystems.description: Tipo de federação suportada para um PractitionerRole

codeSystems.name: ServiceRequestCategory
codeSystems.title: ServiceRequestCategory
codeSystems.description: Categorias utilizadas nos perfis do recurso ServiceRequest

codeSystems.name: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.title: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

codeSystems.name: Condition/Problem/DiagnosisCodes
codeSystems.title: Condition/Problem/Diagnosis Codes
codeSystems.description: Example value set for Condition/Problem/Diagnosis codes.

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTMedicationCodes
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Medication Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all drug or medicament substance codes and all pharmaceutical/biologic products from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTFormCodes
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Form Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all dose form codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar.

codeSystems.name: medicationRequest Course of Therapy Codes
codeSystems.title: Medication request  course of  therapy  codes
codeSystems.description: MedicationRequest Course of Therapy Codes

codeSystems.name: medicationRequest Status Reason Codes
codeSystems.title: Medication request  status  reason  codes
codeSystems.description: MedicationRequest Status Reason Codes

codeSystems.name: FHIRSpecimenCollectionMethod
codeSystems.title: FHIR Specimen Collection Method
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the method by which a specimen was collected.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSSpecimenType
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-specimenType
codeSystems.description: Concepts that describe the precise nature of an entity that may be used as the source material for an observation.  This is one of two code systems that are used instead of table 0070 (code system xxxx) which conflated specimen types and specimen collection methods.   Used in Version 2 messaging in the SPM segment.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSSpecimenCondition
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-specimenCondition
codeSystems.description: Concepts of modes or states of being that describe the nature of a specimen.  Used in Version 2 messaging in the SPM segment.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSRelevantClincialInformation
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-relevantClincialInformation
codeSystems.description: Value Set of codes that specify additional clinical information about the patient or specimen to report the supporting and/or suspected diagnosis and clinical findings on requests for interpreted diagnostic studies.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSVSObservationType
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-VS-observationType
codeSystems.description: Value Set of codes that specify types of observations to enable systems to distinguish between observations sent along with an order, versus observations sent as the result to an order.

codeSystems.description: ***No description***
